original: 'chi med mtshho skyes snying tig gi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs sgyu 'phrul rol mo bzhugs so //

original: snang ba mtha' yas rang byung gdod ma'i mgon //
analyzed: snang ba mtha yas rang byung gdod ma mgon

analyzed: jig rten dbang phyug kun khyab snying rje gter

analyzed: mtshho skye rdo rje chi med ye shes sku

original: /gsol ba 'debs so dngos grub rnam gnyis stshol //
analyzed: ba debs so dngos grub rnam gnyis stshol

analyzed: ye shes dbyings las sprula~m pa~m rdo~m rje~m gar

analyzed: mchog gi rig dzin khyab bdag bla ma la

analyzed: gsol ba debs so dngos grub rnam gnyis stshol

analyzed: bka bab las ldan snying gi bu rnams la

analyzed: gsol ba debs so dngos grub rnam gnyis stshol

analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po dbang chen yab dang yum

analyzed: gsol ba debs so dngos grub rnam gnyis stshol

analyzed: bde chen rdo rje sa la god ba shog

original: /ces pa'ang zab gsang bdud rtshi'i skal pa dge ba can pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rtshal gyis sprel lo sprel zla'i dkar phyogs kyi tshhes bcu la bris nas gsol ba btab pa dge legs 'phel //
